alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 1:02PM AKST until November 23 at 2:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations less than one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley, mainly from Wasilla southwest. * WHEN...Until 2 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The band of rain and freezing rain is moving quickly northward and should have moved north of the Matanuska valley by 2 PM this afternoon. No additional freezing rain is expected after this band of precipitation moves north of the area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
